name: Orc Punt VR
description:
As the God of Akmar, you must defend the village of your faithful servants from a relentless orc onslaught! After all their prayers, it really is only fair that you reward their faith... A wave defense title including both local and global leader-boards! A VR experience that can be played with hands, BUT can also be played ENTIRELY USING YOUR FEET!

Features 7 unique weapon options including hammers, gulf clubs, bowling balls and even your own FEET.

Rack up points and top the global leader-boards by skillfully launching orcs through a variety of point multipliers and build up combo bonuses by juggling the orcs before sending them skyward!

Game can be played both left and right handed.
